professional_summary: Detail-oriented professional with years of experience in background verification and recruitment, authorized to work in the US for any employer.

key_responsibilities: Handled applicant files and verified employment and education details for applicants.
Contacted professional references and initiated background investigations using Barada software.
Utilized Peoplesoft take access applications and collaborated with state agencies.
Developed partnerships with hiring managers and recruitment sources.
Posted job openings
reviewed resumes
and conducted interviews.
Screened candidates and assigned employees to roles.
Maintained positive relationships with applicants and clients.
Maintained employee records and participated in recruiting events.
Updated HR databases and assisted with payroll processing.
Prepared documentation for policy implementations and orientations.
Maintained facilities and used cleaning materials to remove waste.
Managed chemical inventory and utilized LIMS database systems.
Inspected samples and identified missing information in databases.
Entered data into LIMS systems and ensured accuracy of reports.
Managed customer database and processed purchase orders.
Delivered supplies and maintained company vehicles and store locations.
Processed purchase orders and maintained company vehicles.
Operated forklifts and managed store locations.

education.degree: Bachelor of Liberal Studies in Healthcare Administration
